s: There's nothing much to say here. I needed a lever-style interior doorknob so I could open doors with my elbow while carrying stuff. These work great. Took only a few minutes to install, secure, shiny, easy to use. I bought the "passage" versions without the locks, so I can't comment on the ...

s: I wanted to update Schlage brushed nickel knobs to levers and found these AmazonBasics levers for an excellent price. I saved money because I chose the matte black, so instead of buying matching hinges I simply painted my old brass hinges with automotive matte black rustoleum and top coated ...

t: Amazon Basics Closet Door Lever, Hook, Satin Nickel - Amazon.com
s: I was quite lucky that the previous old door knob I was trying to replace exactly matched the lever's dimensions- so installation took about 6 minutes with no issues. Very straight forward, nothing tricky. The oil rubbed bronze is a nice finish and contrasted nicely with my dark tone doors.

t: Amazon.com: Amazon Basics Exterior Door Lever With Lock, Curve, Satin Nickel
s: My wife’s only complaint about the lever style door handles is that the arc of the handle changes depending on the orientation of the door. in one instance, our closet door is right next to a bedroom door, and they are oriented the opposite way, with no way to correct this. Doesn’t affect the function of the door at all, its just an aesthetic issue. ... We like how affordable it is, we have gotten this brand ...

s: They seem sturdy, however, my only issue was that when I went to put the last handle on, it had a small, but very visible, scratch on it. (See photo) I am now a little concerned about how easily these might scratch after some use. I also am not happy that a brand new product came like this.
